signature: int uncompress2(Bytef *dest, uLongf *destLen, const Bytef *source, uLong *sourceLen)

input_structure.dest: Bytef* - destination buffer for uncompressed data
input_structure.destLen: uLongf* - pointer to destination buffer size (input/output)
input_structure.source: const Bytef* - compressed source data buffer
input_structure.sourceLen: uLong* - pointer to source data length (input/output)

error_codes: Z_DATA_ERROR - input data corrupted or incomplete
side_effects: writes uncompressed data to dest buffer
updates *sourceLen with bytes consumed from source
constraints: dest buffer must be large enough for uncompressed data
destLen is both input (buffer size) and output (actual size)
sourceLen is both input (available bytes) and output (consumed bytes)
partial decompression allowed if output buffer too small

buffer_sizes: oversized destLen vs actual uncompressed size
buffer_conditions: exact size destLen = actual uncompressed size
partial source data (*sourceLen < full compressed size)
